name: Harvey's Magic Show
description:
Interact with Harvey the ill-tempered magician's rabbit.

Harvey is a foul mouthed, short tempered, rabbit. He's tired of the neglect and lack of appreciation from his magician/boss.

Wave your magic wand to cast spells and have Harvey perform small tasks around his house, inside the magician's hat. He's always grumpy so you can expect a mouthful of abuse for your efforts.
